name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha Rahman is a 21-year-old psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.97. She is motivated to achieve her academic goals and demonstrates perseverance, even when faced with challenges. While she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and experiences moderate test anxiety, Aisha is generally conscientious and believes in her ability to improve. She is determined to keep working hard and is actively seeking strategies to enhance her study habits and performance.
